title: What is empowering self-defense?
desc: Empowerment through Self-Defense is a unique method of action and prevention of violence, intimidation, and censorship at the work and personal sphere through basic physical self-defense skills and communication and boundary-setting skills.

title: Is ESD a martial art?
desc: No, ESD is not a martial art. Although martial arts may be a way of self-defense preferred by some individuals, ESD is focused more on de-escalating and removing yourself from the situation rather than learning how to fight.

title: Who are the courses for?

title: What will I learn in an ESD class?
desc: Classes cover physical techniques, verbal communication skills, and strategies for preventing and responding to potential threats.

title: How can ESD benefit me in everyday life?
desc: Self-defense skills contribute to improved situational awareness, increased self-confidence, and the ability to navigate potentially dangerous situations.

title: Does ESD focus only on physical techniques?
desc: No, self-defense also emphasizes verbal and emotional skills, promoting de-escalation, assertiveness, and effective communication.

title: Can ESD training help prevent bullying?
desc: Yes, ESD training equips individuals with tools to handle bullying situations, promoting assertiveness and discouraging aggression.

title: Can ESD training benefit survivors of violence?
desc: Yes, self-defense training offers empowerment, healing, and tools to survivors, fostering resilience and a sense of control.

title: Is there an age limit for ESD classes?
desc: Many classes cater to various age groups, ensuring tailored approaches for children, teens, adults, and seniors.

title: I'm not an athlete nor I don't have an athletic figure. Can I participate in the course?
desc: Every person who wants to get empowered by learning how to defend themselves, no matter the gender, age, physical abilities or body shape can participate in our courses.

title: How often should I practice ESD techniques in order to not forget these skills?
desc: Consistent practice is essential for mastery. Regularly attending classes and reviewing techniques helps reinforce skills.

title: I carry a laser, a knife or a boxer. Why should I learn self-defense?
desc: While carrying tools may offer a temporary solution, self-defense training provides a holistic and sustainable approach to personal safety. It equips individuals with the skills and mindset needed to navigate various situations confidently and effectively.
